SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into em_vehicle (`no`, brand_no, color, `type`, frame_no, engine_no, fuel_consumption, total_weight, approved_passenger, purchase_date, maintenance_date, annual_review_date, scrap_date, scrap_status, insurance_date, photo, create_time, update_time, user_id, del_flag, sim_no ) values (#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuelConsumption,jdbcType=REAL}, #{totalWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{approvedPassenger,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maintenanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{annualReviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scrapDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scrapStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{simNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update em_vehicle set `no` = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_no = #{frameNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_no = #{engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuel_consumption = #{fuelConsumption,jdbcType=REAL}, total_weight = #{totalWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, approved_passenger = #{approvedPassenger,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, maintenance_date = #{maintenanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, annual_review_date = #{annualReviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scrap_date = #{scrapDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scrap_status = #{scrapStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insurance_date = #{insuranceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sim_no = #{simNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `no`, brand_no, color, `type`, frame_no, engine_no, fuel_consumption, total_weight, approved_passenger, purchase_date, maintenance_date, annual_review_date, scrap_date, scrap_status, insurance_date, photo, create_time, update_time, user_id, del_flag, sim_no from em_vehicle where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
